CartPage.shippingDescFree: Your order will be delivered by our partner 'EcoMove Logistics'. We ensure safe handling of your items. Delivery typically takes 1-3 business days. You will receive an SMS notification on the morning of the delivery.
CartPage.shippingDescStandard: Standard delivery is handled by 'CityExpress'. Reliable service with tracking available. Expect your package within 1-3 business days. Our couriers will contact you before arrival.
CartPage.shippingDescExpress: Premium express service via 'RocketShip Couriers'. Guaranteed next-day delivery for orders placed before 2 PM. Perfect for urgent gifts or last-minute needs. Priority handling included.

AboutPage.title: We Are Glowy
AboutPage.subtitle: Find your glow with us.
AboutPage.missionText1: We partner with trusted importers and distributors to source high-quality products efficiently.
AboutPage.missionText2: Thanks to these partnerships we secure the best prices on the market and pass the savings on to you.
AboutPage.whyChooseUsSubtitle: The pillars that define our store
AboutPage.naturalIngredientsDesc: We prioritize products with clean, non-toxic ingredients.
AboutPage.crueltyFreeDesc: We love animals. None of our products are tested on them.
AboutPage.premiumQualityDesc: Quality you can trust ‚Äî priced responsibly.
AboutPage.fastShippingDesc: Get your purchases faster with our expedited delivery.
AboutPage.ctaSubtitle: Explore our latest collection and find your new favorites today.

HelpPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
HelpPage.subtitle: Find answers to common questions or get in touch with us
HelpPage.faq_q1_question: How do I track my order?
HelpPage.faq_q1_signed_para1: You can track your order by logging into your account and going to the
HelpPage.faq_q1_signed_para2: section. There, you'll find the tracking information provided by the shipping carrier.
HelpPage.faq_q1_guest_para1: If you placed an order without signing in, you can still track your order by going to the
HelpPage.faq_q1_guest_para2: section on the same device and browser where you created the order. The tracking information will be available in your order confirmation email as well.
HelpPage.faq_q2_answer: You can place an order whether you are signed in or not, but we recommend signing in to make an order. This allows you to manage your orders more easily, get a 20% discount on your first purchase, and earn bonus points (starting from 3% for each completed order), which you can use for future purchases.
HelpPage.faq_q3_question: How can I change my shipping address?
HelpPage.faq_q3_answer: If you are signed in, you can update your shipping address in your profile settings. For guest orders or if the order has already been processed, please contact our customer service team as soon as possible. Changes cannot be guaranteed once the order has been processed.
HelpPage.faq_q4_question: Do you ship to all regions of Armenia?
HelpPage.faq_q4_answer: Yes, we ship to all regions of Armenia. Shipping costs and delivery times may vary by location. Please check our shipping policy for more details.
HelpPage.contactSupport_desc: If you have any problems, leave a message, and our team will contact you as soon as possible.
HelpPage.shipping_domestic_body: We offer free shipping on orders over 10,000 AMD within Armenia. For orders under this amount, standard shipping costs 1,000 AMD. Delivery typically takes 3-7 business days depending on your location.
HelpPage.shipping_processing_body: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days. You will receive a tracking number via email once your order ships.
HelpPage.shipping_issues_body: If you experience any issues with delivery, please contact our customer service team immediately. We are not responsible for delays caused by carriers or customs.
HelpPage.shipping_more: For more detailed information or specific inquiries, please reach out to our support team.

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.subtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information
PrivacyPolicyPage.goal: The goal of this policy is to inform the visitors of glowy.am what data is collected to register on the system and how it is used.
PrivacyPolicyPage.gatheringText: We can gather and keep the following personal information:
PrivacyPolicyPage.gatheringList:
- Name, Surname, E-mail, Phone numbers.
- Bank details if the payment has been done through bank transfer. We do not have any of your payment card detail, because on our portal the online payments are exclusively done through the ARCA payment system.
- Your orders' history, preferred goods list, etc.
- Order delivery address, and the necessary extra information for organizing the delivery.
PrivacyPolicyPage.useText: With this you agree that we can use your personal information for the following:
PrivacyPolicyPage.useList:
- Organizing of orders delivery, provision of services, providing the necessary support.
- Evaluation of the quality of our services and improvement provided by us.
- Verification and reporting of additional information via call or E-mail in non-standard situations.
- Sending notification informing about our goods, services, and order delivery.
PrivacyPolicyPage.privacyText: The information provided to us by you is absolutely considered private and cannot be provided to the third person.
PrivacyPolicyPage.protectionText: Your password is the key to access your account. By choosing a password, use a unique combination of numbers, letters, and special characters. Don't give your password of glowy.am to another one. If, however, you do it, remember that you are responsible for all the actions done from your account. In case of forgetting your password, you can recover it with the help of the website by clicking the "Forgot password" command.
